alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Kent; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 08 at 4:33PM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TUESDAY TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...One to three feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Kent MD, Queen Annes, Talbot and Caroline. * WHEN...From 3 PM Tuesday to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...At this level, widespread roadway flooding occurs in bayside communities and along tidal waterways. Some roads become impassable. Minor damage to vulnerable structures may begin to occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minor tidal flooding is expected Tuesday with the afternoon high tide cycle with water levels expected to continue rising into Tuesday night due to very strong southerly winds. Water levels may stay elevated into Wednesday, and an advisory for continued minor flooding may be necessary. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Chesapeake Bay at Tolchester Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 3.5 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.8 ft, Moderate 2.8 ft, Major 3.8 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 08/05 PM 2.2 0.5 1.0 None 09/05 AM 1.9 0.2 1.5 None 09/09 PM 5.3 3.6 4.7 Moderate 10/05 PM 3.2 1.5 2.0 None 11/05 AM 1.3 -0.4 0.9 None Eastern Bay at Claiborne MLLW Categories - Minor 3.4 ft, Moderate 4.4 ft, Major 5.4 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.7 ft, Moderate 2.7 ft, Major 3.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 08/03 PM 2.2 0.5 1.1 None 09/01 AM 1.8 0.1 1.4 None 10/02 AM 5.0 3.3 4.6 Moderate 10/03 PM 3.4 1.7 2.1 Minor 11/02 AM 1.5 -0.2 1.1 None &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
